resources.string: By signing up,you agree to our
By signing up you agree to our this link
Please enter your registered mobile number to receive the 4 digit OTP

In furtherance of the Terms of Use, I hereby consent to pay the Commission agreed to herein directly to the assigned Broker or to Brongo(for Rental Deals), on the conclusion of the transaction. I acknowledge and agree the failure on my part to make such payment shall provide the assigned Broker or Brongo(as the case may be) rights of a legal claim against me.
In order to protect your privacy and serve you better, please ensure you use the Brongo app to call or chat with the broker.
Your identity will not be revealed to \n the broker
Ratings allow us to ensure a great experience with Brongo for both broker and client. Just like you rate Broker, broker can rate clients on scale of 1-5 Stars after each connection.

Your rating is an average of the rating you’ve received from brokers, and is measure out of 5 stars. Ratings are anonymous, so neither you nor your broker will ever see an individual rating you’ve received.\nVery few people have a perfect rating. So don’t despair if your average isn’t 5.0. Things that seem small to you can matter to your broker – it’s easy to accidentally be late for a meeting. Knowing a little more about the things that affect a broker’s happiness can help you be a 5-start client.
Brokers love when clients are clear with their requirements. Client should know what they want, When they want and where they want

Brokers appreciate those clients who carry below qualities:
 • Always on time
 • Great attitude
 • Organised
 • Professionalism
 • Clear about requirement
 • Open for suggestions
 • Pay commission on time
Simple but true – It’s important that client treat broker and their service the way they‘d would expect to be treated themselves. A positive attitude and considerate use of the service go a long way.

Ratings foster mutual respect between brokers and clients. This strengthens our community and helps everyone get the most from Brongo. Just as you expect brokers to treat you with respect, brokers hope to feel the same acknowledgement from clients. A high rating is about more than bragging right among your friends; it’s a sign that people enjoyed their time with you. Keep up the good work.
A product of Turnip Technologies pvt. ltd Version 4.4.6
